feed.title: [RFC] Proposal: Base58 encoded HD Wallet master seed with optional encryption

entry.title: [RFC] Proposal: Base58 encoded HD Wallet master seed with optional encryption
entry.summary: Jean-Paul has updated a proposal and changed the checksum to be a double SHA256 of the private key rather than the public address string. He also added support for third-party KDF computation. The full proposal with updated test vectors can be found on the Bitcointalk forum at https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=258678. Jean-Paul wishes everyone a Merry Christmas.
